entry.text:
For the period of subscription you will get:
- Triple in-game shop point income. - Special stand out shade of green name color in-game. - Special Discord role and access to the supporter only channels. - Ability to set second home location (/sethome2 and /home2). - Access to a /bag chat command that will take you back to your death location. - Access to /donor Safe Zone with 5 traders and 2 workbenches. - You are allowed to have 17 land claims placed per map. - Permanent player buffs
Player Buffs - [50c878]Tier 3[-]
- 10% XP Gain increase - 5% Walk/Run speed increase - 10% Stamina regen increase - 10% Noise reduction - 5% loot bonus
